title: Junior The Victor, Sand and Soul, Cardi B., Are You Smarter Than Junior, Steve VS Junior, Carla's Reality Update, New Season, Closing Remarks and more.
itunes:title: Junior The Victor, Sand and Soul, Cardi B., Are You Smarter Than Junior, Steve VS Junior, Carla's Reality Update, New Season, Closing Remarks and more.
description:
The show opens and Big Dog recognizes Junior's win. Sand and Soul in Punta Cana DR is finally here and the show talks about the festivities. Cardi B. is in a bit of hot water for a controversial skit she was involved in. Are You Smarter Than Junior? Steve VS Junior. Carla's Reality Update is back and she talks about Love and Hip Hop Hollywood. Uncle Steve talks about the new season of his talk show and tells us about the new features. Closing Remarks is special today because he talks about dreams and the key to living them, plus much more!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
